document.full_text: soldiers with traumatic brain injury caused by a blast may have abnormalities in the white matter of their brain - an important brain cell communication center - that cannot be seen on ordinary brain scans, u.s. researchers said on wednesday.
document.title: blasts may do unique damage to brain: u.s. study
lines_and_colors: soldiers with traumatic brain injury caused by a blast may have abnormalities in the white matter of their brain - an important brain cell communication center - that cannot be seen on ordinary brain scans, u.s. researchers said on wednesday.
